.. _`cs-web-components-base-catalogs.CatalogPreview.__default__`:

==============
CatalogPreview
==============

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========

Catalog preview component

+------------------+---------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
| Property         | Type          | Default      | Use                                         |
+==================+===============+==============+=============================================+
| contextObject    | Immutable.Map | -            | The object to render                        |
+------------------+---------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
